longBusinessSummary: Nan Hai Corporation Limited, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the culture and media, property development, and corporate information technology (IT) application services businesses in Mainland China, Hong Kong, North America, Europe, Australia, and internationally. The company operates through five segments: Enterprise Cloud Services, Property Development, Culture and Media Services, News Media Business, and Innovative Business. It is involved in the investment, construction, and operation of the cinema; production and distribution of the movies; cinema digital media technology business; research and development, and operation of system integration service equipment; and cinema media transmission business. The company also engages in the real estate development and property management services. In addition, it provides e-commerce and IT application services, including Website building, virtual hosting, online shop, enterprise mailbox, network marketing promotion, etc.; and Internet basic services, such as domain name registration, Web hosting, enterprise communication, and SaaS-based enterprise operations and management services, as well as integrated solutions for SMEs, enterprises, institutions, and individuals through online direct sales and agent channels. Further, the company engages in the news media, securities and movie projectors trading, and debt issuance businesses. Additionally, it provides decoration, advertising, and digital media technology services; sells decoration materials; and manufactures, distributes, and retails toiletries. As of December 31, 2019, the company operated 502 cinemas with 3,093 screens. Nan Hai Corporation Limited is headquartered in Beijing, China. Nan Hai Corporation Limited is a subsidiary of Dadi Holdings Limited.
address2: No. 1, Disheng West Road Beijing Economic-Technological Development Area
